 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָלַח‎</span>] **verb** only **Niph\`al** ==be corrupt morally==; ***tainted*** ([[BDB#Che|Che]] [[Ps.14.3|Ps 14:3]]) (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> VIII. ***be confused*** (of a thing), of milk, ***turn sour***) ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶאֱלָ֑חוּ‎</span> [[Ps.14.3|Ps 14:3]]; [[Ps.53.4|Ps 53:4]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶאֱלָח‎</span> ***a corrupt man*** [[Job.15.16|Job 15:16]].
